lines.gurmukhi: jYsy ikrqws gr jwq jl bUMd prI GiRq snbMD jl mD swvDwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Kirataas Gar Jaat Jal Boond Paree , Ghrit Sanabandh Jal Madh Saavadhaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as paper perishes or decays when water falls on it, but when smeared with fat, tolerates the effect of water superbly.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy kot Bwr qUl qnk icng jrY qyl myl dIpk mYN bwqI ibdmwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Kot Bhaar Tool Tanak Chinag Jarai , Tayl Mayl Deepak Main Baatee Bidamaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as millions of bales of cotton get destroyed with a spark of fire, but when associated with oil as a wick, gives out light and lives longer.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy loho bUf jwq sll mYN fwrq hI kwst pRsMg gMg swgr n mwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Loho Bood Jaat Salal Main Daarat Hee , Kaasat Prasang Gang Saagar N Maan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as iron sinks as soon as it is thrown in water, but when attached with wood, it floats and disregards the waters of river Ganges or even sea.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy jm kwl bRXwl sgl sMswr gRwsY siqgur Bytq hI dwsn dswn hY ]561]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Jam Kaal Byaal Sagal Sansaar Graasai , Satigur Bhaytat Hee Daasan Dasaan Hai ?561?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly death-like snake is swallowing everyone. But once consecration from the Guru in the form of Naam is obtained, then the angel of death becomes slave of the slaves.  (561)
